mapper.select: /** com.pharm.chorok.web.main.repository.ReservationScheduleRepository.selectSameWeekDateListByDt */ SELECT BASE_DT , DAYS_STR_KOR , DATE_FORMAT( BASE_DT, '%m-%d') AS BASE_DT_STR , DAYS_NUM FROM TB_COMM_CALENDAR CAL WHERE CAL.WK_NUM = (SELECT WK_NUM FROM TB_COMM_CALENDAR WHERE BASE_DT_STR = #{baseDtStr} ) AND DAYS_NUM > 1 ORDER BY BASE_DT

/** com.pharm.chorok.web.main.repository.ReservationScheduleRepository.selectDashBoardDateListByDt */ SELECT BASE_DT , DAYS_STR_KOR , DATE_FORMAT( BASE_DT, '%m-%d') AS BASE_DT_STR , DAYS_NUM FROM TB_COMM_CALENDAR CAL WHERE BASE_DT >= DATE_FORMAT( NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND BASE_DT <= DATE_FORMAT( DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY BASE_DT

/** com.pharm.chorok.web.main.repository.ReservationScheduleRepository.selectDateAdd */ SELECT * FROM TB_COMM_CALENDAR WHERE base_dt = date_add( STR_TO_DATE( #{cal.baseDtStr}, '%Y%m%d'), interval #{interval} DAY)

/** com.pharm.chorok.web.main.repository.ReservationScheduleRepository.selectRsvtSchByWeek */ SELECT WT.ID AS "wt.id" , WT.START_HM AS "wt.startHm" , WT.END_HM AS "wt.endHm" , SCH.RSVT_ID , SCH.RSVT_DT , SCH.RSVT_USR_NM , SCH.PIC_USR_NO , CASE LENGTH(RSVT_CELL_NO) WHEN 11 THEN CONCAT(LEFT(RSVT_CELL_NO, 3), '-', MID('***********', 4, 4), '-', RIGHT(RSVT_CELL_NO, 4)) WHEN 10 THEN CONCAT(LEFT(RSVT_CELL_NO, 3), '-', MID('**********' , 4, 3), '-', RIGHT(RSVT_CELL_NO, 4)) END AS RSVT_CELL_NO , SCH.DAYS_NUM AS "cal.daysNum" FROM TB_PP_WORK_TIME WT INNER JOIN ( SELECT RSVT_ID , DATE_FORMAT(RSVT_DT, '%H%i%s') AS RSVT_HM , RSVT_DT , RSVT_USR_NM , RSVT_CELL_NO , CUST_ID , PIC_USR_NO , CAL.DAYS_NUM , CAL.DAYS_STR_KOR FROM TB_PP_RSVT_SCH INNER JOIN TB_COMM_CALENDAR CAL ON DATE_FORMAT(RSVT_DT, '%Y%m%d') = CAL.BASE_DT WHERE CAL.WK_NUM = (SELECT WK_NUM FROM TB_COMM_CALENDAR WHERE BASE_DT_STR = #{baseDtStr} ) AND CAL.DAYS_NUM > 1 ) SCH ON WT.START_HM <= STR_TO_DATE(SCH.RSVT_HM, '%H%i%s') AND WT.END_HM >= STR_TO_DATE(SCH.RSVT_HM, '%H%i%s') WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY WT.START_HM , SCH.RSVT_DT

/** com.pharm.chorok.web.main.repository.ReservationScheduleRepository.selectWorkTime */ SELECT WT.WORK_VER , WT.ID , WT.START_HM , WT.END_HM FROM TB_PP_WORK_TIME WT WHERE WT.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY WT.START_HM

/** com.pharm.chorok.web.main.repository.ReservationScheduleRepository.selectTimeList */ SELECT STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(HH, MM), '%H%i') AS START_HM FROM (SELECT LPAD(n , 2, '0') AS HH FROM t where n between 9 and 18) HRS , (SELECT LPAD(n*10, 2, '0') AS MM FROM t where n between 0 and 5) MINS WHERE 1 = 1

/** com.pharm.chorok.web.main.repository.ReservationScheduleRepository.findReservationInfoByRsvtId */ SELECT RSVT_ID , RSVT_USR_NM , RSVT_CELL_NO , RSVT_PHN_NO , RSVT_DT , RSVT_TP_CD , GEN_TP_CD , RSVT_DESC , PIC_USR_NO , CUST_ID FROM TB_PP_RSVT_SCH SCH WHERE RSVT_ID = #{rsvtId}

/** com.pharm.chorok.web.main.repository.ReservationScheduleRepository.findReservationTimeList */ SELECT DISTINCT STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT( WT.START_HM, '%H'), RPAD(TMP.N, 2, '0')), '%H%i') AS startHm FROM TB_PP_WORK_TIME WT CROSS JOIN t TMP ON N < 6 WHERE WT.USE_YN = 'Y'

/** com.pharm.chorok.web.main.repository.ReservationScheduleRepository.findCustomerByRsvtSchId */ SELECT RSVT_USR_NM AS CUST_USR_NM , RSVT_CELL_NO AS CUST_CELL_NO , GEN_TP_CD AS CUST_GEN_TP_CD FROM TB_PP_RSVT_SCH A WHERE 1 = 1 AND RSVT_ID = #{rsvtId}

SELECT SRSVT_ID , RSVT_USR_NM , RSVT_DT , RSVT_CELL_NO , RSVT_PHN_NO , RSVT_TP_CD , GEN_TP_CD , RSVT_DESC , RCMD_USR_NO , PIC_USR_NO , CUST_ID , REG_DT , REG_USR_NO , UPD_DT , UPD_USR_NO FROM TB_PP_RSVT_SCH WHERE RSVT_DT >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL + 1 DAY ), '%Y%m%d') AND RSVT_DT < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL + 2 DAY ), '%Y%m%d')

SELECT SRSVT_ID , RSVT_USR_NM , RSVT_DT , RSVT_CELL_NO , RSVT_PHN_NO , RSVT_TP_CD , GEN_TP_CD , RSVT_DESC , RCMD_USR_NO , PIC_USR_NO , CUST_ID , REG_DT , REG_USR_NO , UPD_DT , UPD_USR_NO FROM TB_PP_RSVT_SCH WHERE DATE_FORMAT(RSVT_DT, '%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d')
